thread.title: London's finest hotel.
thread.title_full: London's finest hotel. - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steve F
title: London's finest hotel.
text:
We are currently in London and we are so impressed with our room and the fantastic location that we wanted to share this experience with everyone. One of the best hotels in London with everything we expected and more within reach. The concierge staff are 100% helpful and knowledgable of this amazing city. Keep up the good work.
Here everyone walks rather than driving everywhere and we love this. Plenty of famous black cabs if you need them though!
